CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The current density - voltage ( J-V ) characteristics of the optimized solar cells are shown in Fig.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| optimized solar cells |
| J-V |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| optimized solar cells |

I removed "J-V" as it is not a material name, but rather an abbreviation for "current density - voltage".

Note: The entities "Fig." and "Let's" do not clearly refer to "Material property" and have been removed from the table.
